text: Gaspard Lemaire (1899 – 1979) was a Belgian swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Belgian male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Belgium Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Antwerp Category:Belgian male backstroke swimmers
title: Gaspard Lemaire
